==Trivia==
* Rodamonte and Renaud are both named after characters from ''{{w|Orlando Innamorato}}'' and ''{{w|Orlando Furioso}}'', two major works in the medieval literary cycle of the {{w|Matter of France}}. Rodamonte is named after {{w|Rodomonte}}, an African king who leads a Saracen army against Charlemagne.
